name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: A premium quality cotton t-shirt with a comfortable fit. Made from 100% organic cotton, this versatile piece is perfect for everyday wear. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

name: Denim Jacket
description: A timeless denim jacket that never goes out of style. Crafted from high-quality denim with vintage-inspired details. Perfect for layering and adding a casual edge to any outfit.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: Modern slim-fit jeans with stretch comfort technology. These jeans offer the perfect balance of style and comfort, featuring a contemporary cut that flatters all body types.

name: Knit Sweater
description: Cozy knit sweater perfect for cooler weather. Made from a soft wool blend with ribbed details at the cuffs and hem. A wardrobe essential that combines warmth with sophisticated style.
